name: Player 1, close your eyes
description:
This is a two-player game of trust and deception. At the beginning of the game, both players take turns closing their eyes and get a number. Then the players of both sides each have 20 chips divided into different piles, and begin to take turns to trade first (that is, players exchange a pile of chips each). When trading, they can cheat, that is, not give each other chips. When the total number of chips on the field of a player is the number seen before, the player wins. If there is no winner in 10 rounds, both players lose.

The game could only be operated with gamepads.

Who made it:

Designer, Programmer:吴佳渠 Jiaqu Wu

programmer: 吴青璐 anlideer Wu

no artist(we use some resources from other project, and some from anlideer's friend)

这是一个有关信任与欺骗的双人游戏。游戏开始的时候双方玩家轮流闭眼，并得到一个数字。随后双方玩家各拥有20个筹码分成不同堆，并开始轮流先手交易（即玩家各拿一堆筹码交换），交易的时候可以作弊，即不给对方筹码。当一个玩家目前场上筹码总数为之前看到的数字时，该玩家获胜，若10回合没有获胜者，双方玩家皆输。

仅支持手柄游玩
